x_symbol.syntax: xTabPanelGroup(id, w, h, th, clsTP, clsTG, clsTD, clsTS)

par.name: w
par.note: Overall width. Pass a zero if you want width controlled by CSS.

par.name: h
par.note: Overall height. Pass a zero if you want height controlled by CSS.

meth.name: onResize(newW, newH)
meth.note: pass zeros if you want width and height controlled by CSS

comment.author: mf
comment.note: Assumes tabPanelGroup element (overall container) has a 1px border. The select() method's argument should be "1-based".

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Removed unload method - now adds its own unload listener. Added the instances object so your app does not have to keep a reference to the tpg object: xTabPanelGroup.instances['outerContainerID'].

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Removed use of xZIndex and xDisplay.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Added an onResize method. w and h arguments can now be zero, allowing you to set height in CSS and allow width to flow with the HTML. Thanks for everyone's feedback!

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Two dependencies were not listed. Thanks, Jason! Also added semicolons to the end of the public method assignments.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: I added the select() method for Jonathan. Made the demo much more accessible, using A elements as tabs instead of divs and now support onfocus event for kbd nav.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: pdub23 found a little Firefox quirk (inputs had focus but no cursor) and he and Jose Ignacio Santa Cruz both pointed out that form controls were 'showing through' for IE. I think I've fixed both issues.
